entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning except minus 8 near the Saskatchewan border. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning except minus 8 near the Saskatchewan border. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 5:28 PM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:28 PM CST Friday 30 December 2022
